thread.title: Sony reaches multi-million dollar settlement with ex-employees over hack

title: Sony reaches multi-million dollar settlement with ex-employees over hack
text:
Sony reaches multi-million dollar settlement with ex-employees over hack 
Published By: Tuaw.com - Today 
Nearly a year after being infiltrated and bullied by hacker group GOP (Guardians of Peace), Sony is still feeling the effects of the breach....
